title: Drawing, "The old Guns at Morro Castle, Santiago de Cuba", 1885
medium: Graphite, white chalk on gray paper
inscribed: Inscribed in pen and black ink, at lower left margin:  Drawn by Winslow Homer / at Morro Castle / Santiago de Cuba - .
creditline: Gift of Charles Savage Homer, Jr.
description: Horizontal view of a cannon and the searchlight on the parapet of the Spanish fort, Morro Castle, with the harbor of Santiago de Cuba visible in the background.

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, "The old Guns at Morro Castle, Santiago de Cuba", 1885.
1885. Graphite, white chalk on gray paper. Gift of Charles Savage Homer, Jr.. 1912-12-1.
